Articles.Content:
I initially had the idea after watching some KSP videos and reading/participating in KAR WARS. If I ever make something similar to KAR WARS but more story oriented (KAR TREK, maybe?), this will feature majorly. I will update this as development continues.

The mods that will be important to note are Restock, Restock+, and Waterfall restock effects.
This was the original intention for kar wars
